blog.name: voicemailsfrompeterparker
blog.title: Voicemails From Peter Parker
blog.description:
A collection of voicemail transcriptions from Peter Parker to Tony Stark.
Documented by F.R.I.D.A.Y and @foxbowl (updates every Friday). 

Click here to see Peter's voicemails in chronological order!
Request for a voicemail and F.R.I.D.A.Y. will try to find it in her archives ↓

tags: @anon who's been recommending this blog- tysm you're the best! (pt. 1 of 2)
summary: ————————————————————— Voicemail #22 To: Tony Stark From: Peter Parker Oh my god, Mr. Stark, what do I do? Aunt May, she- she-...
body:
—————————————————————

Voicemail #22

To: Tony Stark

From: Peter Parker

Oh my god, Mr. Stark, what do I do? Aunt May, she- she-

-she’s brought home a date, Mr. Stark!

I know that this isn’t what you’d normally expect me to call you about but Ned’s not picking up his phone and I need to tell someone because THIS IS AN EMERGENCY!

She didn’t even tell me, Mr. Stark. He just showed up! One moment I’m sitting on the couch doing my homework and another moment there’s this knock on the door. May was in the other room shouting something that kinda sounded like “I’ll get it!” but I thought I’d do her a favor and answer it myself. So I opened the door to this tall, blond dude who looked about mid-forties and I assumed he must have the wrong apartment number because Aunt May didn’t freaking tell me we were expecting anybody! But as I was about to tell him he’s got the wrong place, he went “you must be Peter”. And I froze because normally when a dude at the other side of the doorway says stuff like that, they’re some sort of supervillain.

But right as I was about to jump-kick him in the face, May walked in and went “Gene! I’m glad you could come”. And, finally, after she gave the intruder the longest hug, she turned to me and said “Peter, this is Gene from my work. He and I have been having dinner for the last couple weeks”. She was barely looking at me even though I was staring little daggers at her and, all of a sudden, it clicked that May hadn’t actually been staying at work all that late.

So I put on this fake smile, Mr. Stark, because it sure as hell wasn’t a real one and shook his hand. He smiled at me and said “hiya, pal”. He called me ‘pal’, Mr. Stark. I’m not his pal. I’m- I’m Aunt May’s ‘pal’. Or, I’m supposed to be, but she didn’t even bother telling me she has a boyfriend!

She made a nice dinner for him. It was shrimp scampi- one of those meals she cooked a long time ago that was perfect for three. Well, it tasted amazing and Gene never complimented it once! He just said “mmmhm” every once and a while, which just isn’t the same as an actual compliment.

And he’s not leaving, Mr. Stark. Dinner was done an hour ago and they’re just sitting on the couch, talking. Why can’t he just- just go away and never come back?

Ughh, I sound like- like a baby. Who cares if my aunt has a boyfriend? Who cares if he called me ‘pal’ or didn’t compliment the stupid shrimp scampi?

And… to be honest, Gene isn’t actually that bad. He seems like a decent guy, I mean. I guess- I guess I just didn’t expect Aunt May to just… move on so quickly, y’know?

I just really, really wish she’d told me. Maybe then I’d understand why she just, like, forgot about Unc-

WHAT?

…

OKAY, I’M COMING, ONE SEC.

May’s calling me. I gotta go, Mr. Stark. I guess I’ll call you later.

—————————————————————

WHAT?

…

OKAY, I’M COMING, ONE SEC.

May’s calling me. I gotta go, Mr. Stark. I guess I’ll call you later.

summary: So I bought an Art Deco captain America print for my game room in the new flat I’m moving into this Thursday and I’m real...
body:
So I bought an Art Deco captain America print for my game room in the new flat I’m moving into this Thursday and I’m real frickin excited.

Also found out there are iron man, spider man and hulk ones. Like. Yes. ✨✨✨

tags: im still hungover over it all
summary: Still hungover over Civil War and Infinty war
body:
Still hungover over Civil War and Infinty war

Is it just me or does it happen to everyone when they go back to see the captain America civil war trailer where Spider-Man makes an entrance years and years later (spiderman homecoming and infinity war has released)…and you know each and every scene by heart and what happens after and you dont feel the hysteria of seeing Spider-Man anymore because you’ve just seen him die in the arms of the guy who brought him into the avengers universe.

It’s like you’re soo numb you dont even feel happiness anymore seeing that movie anymore because that movie gave you the first scene between Tony and Peter and while you’re watching the movie again, you’re just numb and sad and the only thing going on in ur mind is that “cute father-son pair…oh rite…he dies…why am I even watching this movie, the trailer….why am I torturing myself”

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: We Made It Before
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2DYYZow

by AdoreAdore54

”Mr. Stark requests Avengers meet him in the communal area on the first floor.“

“Have he and Bruce found a way to change me back?”

“No, Captain. It seems that your situation has become public knowledge.”

 –

Steve’s getting sick of being unable to leave the Avengers Compound. Bucky’s getting sick of trying to keep track of the five-foot-four mass of pent-up rage.

Part three of my de-serumed Steve fic.

Words: 4381, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 3 of The Adventures of James Buchanan Barnes and his Deserumed Boyfriend

  • Fandoms: Captain America (Movies), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M

  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers
  • Additional Tags: De-Serumed Steve Rogers, Fluff and Angst, Fluff and Crack, Non-Serum Steve Rogers/Winter Soldier Bucky Barnes | Shrinkyclinks, sort of

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Rise of the Phoenix
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2ShJ1cd

by Lone_Wolf_Fanfics

Loki. Captured and taken to the Jotun Palace he must lie, he must claim that has an interest in his rightful place on the Jotunheim throne. (If he doesn’t they would kill him) There are traditions and rules to be adhered. Buying himself time to come up with a better escape plan he comes to terms with being alone, knowing that Thor wouldn’t risk a diplomatic incident without thought and plans. Loki needs to get out of Jotunheim before he is killed.

Thor returns to Earth and enlists the Avengers to help save his brother, the only Avenger that has a chance at surviving the harsh climate of the jagged cold is their newest and most unstable. Still recovering from her treatment at the hands of Hydra, Nina is nowhere near mission ready and Bucky is reluctant to let his sister go.

Words: 5249, Chapters: 4/?, Language: English

Series: Part 4 of Marvel

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel, The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Thor (Movies), Thor (Comics)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Loki (Marvel), Thor (Marvel), James “Bucky” Barnes, Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Jotuns (Marvel), Bruce Banner, Wanda Maximoff, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Pepper Potts
  • Relationships: Loki/Original Female Character(s), Loki/Nina Barnes
  • Additional Tags: Mutant, Enhanced, Jotunn Loki (Marvel), Sad mutant, sad bucky, sad Steve, Good Brother Bucky, Twin brother Bucky

read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2ShJ1cd

trail.content_raw:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2ShJ1cd

by Lone_Wolf_Fanfics

Loki. Captured and taken to the Jotun Palace he must lie, he must claim that has an interest in his rightful place on the Jotunheim throne. (If he doesn’t they would kill him) There are traditions and rules to be adhered. Buying himself time to come up with a better escape plan he comes to terms with being alone, knowing that Thor wouldn’t risk a diplomatic incident without thought and plans. Loki needs to get out of Jotunheim before he is killed.

Thor returns to Earth and enlists the Avengers to help save his brother, the only Avenger that has a chance at surviving the harsh climate of the jagged cold is their newest and most unstable. Still recovering from her treatment at the hands of Hydra, Nina is nowhere near mission ready and Bucky is reluctant to let his sister go.

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Call Of The Sea
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Aodaiw

by Lone_Wolf_Fanfics

Steve Rogers and Mira Stark have been through a lot over the years, but finally they feel settled, everything is quiet, the Avengers are back together, Bucky has been freed of Hydra and Thor is on his way back to Earth.

But one mission knocks a kink into plans, relationships and feelings. And soon Steve finds himself without the one thing he knows he cannot survive without and MIra has lost everything.

Words: 4805, Chapters: 4/?, Language: English

A place to write my thoughts.

I like Marvel, DC, Harry Potter & Star Wars.

I have my specific ships and otps.

Multi-fandom

summary: Truth hurts, doesn’t it? Next time anyone considers Peter & Tony a father & son team, REMEMBER that they hated each other in the...
body:
Truth hurts, doesn’t it? Next time anyone considers Peter & Tony a father & son team, REMEMBER that they hated each other in the comics. Maybe MCU was a good thing for Tony Stark’s character(although I wouldn’t completely consider him nice especially not in Homecoming) but let’s not forgot what actually happened.

@twistedpurity @animesshadow @prettyblackkitty

tags: i love bruce but. man cmon
summary: man i just finished watching im3 again and that post credit scene just. makes me so Angry. Like Tony finally found it in him to...
body:
man i just finished watching im3 again and that post credit scene just. makes me so Angry. Like Tony finally found it in him to confide in someone else, tell him these things that were bothering him to get it off his chest, and bruce falls asleep on him. you can see how hurt tony gets just by watching his reaction. 

and when bruce tells him he’s “not that kind of doctor” tony replies with “so?” he’s not looking for a doctor bruce, he’s looking for a friend who will listen to him

summary:
